titles.title: A bill for the relief of Robert Kuan Liang and Chun-Mei Hsu-Liang
A bill for the relief of Robert Kuan Liang and Chun-Mei Hsu-Liang

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Declares that Robert Kuan Liang and Chun-Mei Hsu-Liang shall be eligible for issuance of an immigrant visa or for adjustment of status to that of an alien lawfully admitted for permanent residence upon filing the appropriate application.
